name: Device Record
summary: Learn about .DEVICEINFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can create a DEVICEINFO file by selecting the "Export" icon next to "Share" in the top-left of the iPhone Configuration Utility window. Fill in your desired name for the record, save location, and confirm that the "Export type" is selected as "Device Record" in the dropdown menu. Then click "Save."
NOTE: As of iOS 8 Apple iPhone Configuration Utility is no longer available.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
